18.code:
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def crawl(url):
    response = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser')
    return soup

from crawl import crawl

def search(query):
    soup = crawl('https://google.com/search?q=' + query)
    results = soup.find_all('a', href=True)
    return results
